sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import { MainContainer, DashboardContainer, ControlsContainer, ChartsContainer, LogoContainer, MainTitle, SocChartsContainer, EnvChartsContainer, EmissionContainer, ReqContainer, ChartPaper, ChartTitle, colorGreen, ModalContainer } from "./styles"; import { ValueContainer, MapContainer, ControlContainer, FamiliesContainer, LandFillContainer } from "./containers"; import { Message } from "./components"; import { FixedInfoButton, QuestionMarkGillSemiBold, Modal } from "../../components"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { toggleModal } from "../../store/furnitureBankReducer/actions"; import styled, {css} from 'styled-components' import { Paper } from "@material-ui/core"; import { FlexContainer, fontSizeM, paddingS, TextSpan, fontWeightL, fontSizeXS } from "../../styles"; const Dashboard = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { openModal } = useSelector(state => state.furnitureBankReducer) const handleToggleModal = () => dispatch(toggleModal()) return ( <> Furniture Bank 2019 What is Furniture Bank? Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Quidem, temporibus excepturi ratione reprehenderit expedita adipisci tempora voluptatem iure quos impedit. Fuga? } iconLeft="19%" iconBottom="17%" handleClick={handleToggleModal} /> What is the estimated social impact of your donation? What is the estimated environmental impact of your donation? What is the estimated CO2 emission saved? ); }; export default Dashboard;
